name: Lost in the DEADREALM(browser)
description:
WASD to move. Walk over to restart game and press E to start the tutorial.

Want to play fullscreen? download on windows:  https://crispproductions.itch.io/deadrealm

Lost in the DEADREALM is a 2D thriller platformer game. You find yourself in an uninviting dimension with no memory of how you got there. A vast place filled with spirits of the dead, and vicious monsters. 

  • Run from nearly unstoppable monsters
  • Find and use hatchets to defend yourself
  • Collect secret documents in each level to unravel more of the story of the realm, and acquire useful upgrades.
